name: XWUI Description List Component
description: Description list component for displaying term-value pairs. Supports bordered and column layouts, various sizes, and horizontal/vertical orientations. Useful for displaying metadata and key-value information.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

bordered.description: Whether to show borders around items

column.description: Number of columns for grid layout

size.description: Size of the description list items

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the description list

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

value.description: Value for the item (string or HTMLElement)

span.description: Number of columns to span in grid layout
